title: The Angel in the Window
description: Alexander Porterfield may be one of the rising stars ofNelson’s navy, but his relationship with his first lieutenant,Tom Anderson, makes him vulnerable. To blackmail, to theexposure of their relationship—and to losing Tom, eitherin battle or to another ship.When sudden danger strikes—from the English ratherthan the French—where should a man turn?
author: Charlie Cochrane
